overview: The only thing Bridgette loves more than sex is money, and she’s willing to do whatever it takes to secure her spot at the top of the economic food chain. But Bridgette isn’t your average gold digger – she’s smart, cunning, cutthroat and never shies away from playing dirty, especially when it comes to dealing with her husband’s biggest business rival, Holloway International. After catching Ariana, the young heir to the Holloway fortune, trying to trick her husband into signing over ownership of his wildly successful company, Bridgette is hell-bent on destroying the entitled little slut and everything she holds dear. How far will she go to get her revenge? Let’s just say that Bridgette isn’t afraid of getting a little blood (or, better yet, cum) on her hands.
title: Rich Fucks
